full_summary:
### Repair of Military Vehicles Tender

* **Tender Title:** French: La réparation de véhicules militaires; English: Repair of Military Vehicles
* **Tender Reference Number:** PW_HAL-502-11561
* **Closing Date:** September 13, 2022, 13:00:00
* **Publication Date:** August 19, 2022

**Trade Agreements and Categories**
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* **Procurement Category:** SRVTGD
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**
* The Canadian Department of National Defence (DND) is inviting bids for a two-year Initial Period with two one-year Optional Periods for the repair of military vehicles at the CFB Halifax.
* The contract is worth repairing approximately 40 2003/2004 GMC 2500/3500 trucks and associated services.
* Request for Proposal (RFP) documents can be downloaded from the [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/18/d9162e59e62bc7126227d73bb13f3bf3/ABES.PROD.PW_HAL.B502.E11561.EBSU000.PDF).
* Offerors may submit their bids electronically using the CPC Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation, as outlined in Part 2 of the RFP.

**Key Dates**
* Closing Date: September 13, 2022, 13:00:00

**Contact Information**

* For technical and contractual inquiries, please contact:
	+ Mr. Richard Parsons
	+ Email: richard.parsons@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (902) 399-8427
	+ Fax: (902) 496-5016

* Offerors are required to make requests for information prior to the closing date to allow sufficient time for a response. Written requests for information must be received at least five calendar days prior to the closing date.
